title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 434.4 - Time and place of the hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 434.4 - Time and place of the hearing

State Regulations

The hearing must be held at a time and place convenient
to the appellant as far as practicable, taking into account circumstances such
as the physical inability of the appellant to travel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
434.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
